title: DGCX Partners with UAEs Wealth Monitor Magazine
text:
(MENAFN Press) 

Wealth Monitor June-July Issue



DGCX and Wealth Monitor will create and explore areas of mutual cooperation 
The partnership seeks to promote the activities and work of DGCX through the Wealth Monitor platform
UAE-based Semantics Global Media FZ-LLC, publisher of the flagship monthly financial markets related magazine 'Wealth Monitor', is pleased to announce that it has clinched partnership with Dubai Gold & Commodities Exchange (DGCX) to develop mutual cooperation.

As a real step forward to strengthen this partnership, both parties have signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) that sets out the broad contours of this cooperation with emphasis to promote the activities and work of DGCX through Wealth Monitor magazine.

As part of this partnership Wealth Monitor magazine shall be displayed at DGCX office and DGCX employees and members will be given subscription of the magazine. 

Commenting on DGCX's association with Wealth Monitor, Gaurang Desai, Interim CEO of DGCX said, "We find Wealth Monitor magazine a cut above the rest in the GCC region's financial markets publishing sector. The magazine is fast becoming a must read companion for the business owners, professionals, executives, and others in and around the GCC region; so we hope that larger DGCX community enjoy using it." He added "We will be utilizing the reach and content capabilities of the magazine to engage with our customers more actively."

Arshad Khan, Editor-in-Chief, Wealth Monitor, said, "Given our expertise in producing and disseminating cutting-edge financial markets related content and DGCX's pioneering role in product innovations and developing the regional market for derivatives, we consider this partnership symbiotic. With thoroughly researched editorial supported by latest data, forecasts and analytics, our growth in just a few months has been beyond our expectations and we stand committed to serving our readers and stakeholders to their fullest satisfaction." 

About Wealth Monitor 
Wealth Monitor is a monthly finance/business magazine published by Semantics Global Media FZ LLC, based in Dubai, UAE. Wealth Monitor is a print platform and the real-time web portal providing impartial and transparent insight to readers on current business issues, money matters, personal finance and wealth management, through quality and engaging editorial. Wealth Monitor aims to be much more than a printed product. Its objective is to bridge the gap between the regional business and financial services industry and its users and give a contextual analysis to latest business and financial trends. For more information, please visit www.semantics.ae.About DGCX:Established in 2005, DGCX is the region's first derivatives exchange and the only one allowing participants to clear and settle transactions within the Gulf region. The Exchange has played a pioneering role in developing the regional market for derivatives. DGCX is majority owned by Dubai Multi Commodities Centre (DMCC), a strategic initiative of the Government of Dubai, with a mandate to enhance commodity trade flows through the Emirate by providing the appropriate physical, market, financial infrastructure and services required.. It is an electronic commodity and currency derivatives exchange with 267 members from across the globe, offering futures and options contracts covering the precious metals, energy and currency sectors. For more information: www.dgcx.ae
